summary: With <EXPERIENCE-PERIOD> as a software professional in enterprise application software development and maintenance, have worked extensively on web server side JEE, client side, web services, middleware, cloud, desktop and console based solutions. As a technologist-thinker and full stack developer, always strive for excellence with robust and modern solutions leveraging primarily Java EE/Spring MVC/Rest as backend and Angular/Typescript as frontend technologies. Especially programming has been my passion since college days starting with C/C++, Java, HTML etc. Shall always remain a programming enthusiast and continuously grow into maturity as a software developer.
